requirements.summary: Design professional educational website theme with cohesive styling
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design is appropriate for an educational institution
Color scheme is professional and cohesive
Typography is readable and suitable for academic content

file_operations.description: Define a professional educational color palette avoiding blue and purple (consider using warm earth tones, greens, or traditional academic colors like burgundy/gold), establish appropriate font families for headings and body text suitable for an academic institution, and set base typography styles

Extend Tailwind configuration with custom theme colors that align with the educational aesthetic (avoiding blue and purple), define custom font families if needed, and establish spacing/layout utilities that support a clean, organized design

Apply the professional educational theme through structured layout with clear visual hierarchy, appropriate spacing and padding, organized sections for school information, and cohesive styling that conveys trust and credibility suitable for a school website
